item.description:
This is an operation deigned to reach churchgoers in the Nashua area. Mike Malloy is on board with literature and can brief volunteers on the plan in detail.

There is no specific time or place for tehis event yet - please contact:
building@ourladylourdesschool.com (Mike Malloy) - 215 913 1183
or
mfaiella@ronpaul2008.com (Mike Faiella) 603 724 0320

to coordinate and arrange pickups etc.

Thanks.

GO RON PAUL!!!
item.name: outreach with Mike Faiella and Mike Malloy
